'''12w05a''' is the third [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.2.1]], released on February 2, 2012,<ref>{{cite|url=http://web.archive.org/web/0/http://www.mojang.com/2012/02/minecraft-snapshot-12w05a/|title=Minecraft Snapshot 12w05a|website=Mojang.com|author=Jens Bergensten|date=February 2, 2012}}</ref> which makes minor changes to mobs.

12w05a was reuploaded later on February 2, 2012, to fix a bug where the game would crash when right-clicking a sitting cat empty-handed, as well as fixing racist translation griefings.<ref>{{tweet|jeb|165083905773412354|Snapshot is back online! http://mojang.com/2012/02/02/minecraft-snapshot-12w05a/|02 Feb 12}}</ref>

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
[[File:Dead Bush JE1 BE1.png|width=40x40]]'''[[Dead bush]]es'''
* Can be obtained by breaking them using [[shears]].

=== Items ===
[[File:Fire Charge JE1 BE1.png|width=44x44]]'''[[Fire charge]]s'''
* Can be crafted using [[charcoal]].

=== Mobs ===
[[File:Creeper JE3 BE1.png|width=82x82]]'''[[Creeper]]s'''
* Have new AI: they now stalk the player.

[[File:Ghast JE1 BE1.png|width=63x63]]'''[[Ghast]]s'''
* Updated hitbox to incorporate their whole body, prior to this ghasts could only be injured by hitting their tentacles and lower body.

[[File:Ocelot JE1 BE1.png|width=83x83]]'''[[Ocelot]]s'''
* Are now easier to tame, and tamed ocelots can now be told to sit.

'''[[Villager]]s'''
* Try to detect [[village]] houses and live in them.
* Now have the ability to open and close doors.

=== World generation ===
'''[[Mineshaft]]s'''
* Now bridge over ravines.

=== General ===
'''[[Enchanting]]'''
* No longer requires [[experience]] in [[Creative]] mode.

'''[[Language]]s'''
* Updated language files.

'''[[Sound]]s'''
* [[Lava]] sounds now function.

== Fixes ==
'''2 bugs fixed'''
* Corrected a duplication bug involving [[nether portal]]s.
* Removed racial slur from the title screen when using the Afrikaans language.</onlyinclude>
